title: Luis Revilla
data: Luis "Lucho" Revilla (born 1972 in La Paz, Bolivia) is a Bolivian politician who has been the mayor of La Paz since 31 May 2010, succeeding Juan del Granado.  Before becoming mayor, he worked over ten years for the city.[1]  He is married to Maricruz Ribera.[1] This article about a mayor in Bolivia is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
